ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
Surely We revealed it on the grand night.
And what will make you comprehend what the grand night
ayas.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā laylatul qadr

ayas.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
ayas.translation: The grand night is better than a thousand months.
ayas.transliteration: laylatul qadri khayrun min alfi shahr

ayas.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
ayas.translation: The angels and Jibreel descend in it by the permission of their Lord for every affair,
ayas.transliteration: tanazzalul malā-ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi-idhni rabbihim min kulli amr

ayas.translation: Peace! it is till the break of the morning.
